topic.title: Installing the License Server All-Platform Distribution

ol.li: [Prerequisite] Java 11 or later must be installed.
Download the HTTP license server all-platform archive from the HTTP License Server website.

Run the license server scripts suitable for your operating system (licenseServer.bat for Windows or licenseServer.sh for Linux and macOS).To specify a different port (other than the default 8080), you can pass the new port number as an argument to the scripts (for example, licenseServer.bat 8082). You can also change the port by editing the following vmoptions file: oXygen HTTP License Server\Windows Service\oXygenHTTPLicenseServer.vmoptions.

On the first run, you are prompted to set two sets of credentials:
Administrator credentials - Used for accessing the Oxygen license server administrative interface.
Standard user credentials - Used by an Oxygen application to connect to the license server.
